restaurants.title: La Ciccia
restaurants.short_description: Popular Sardinian spot offering pasta dishes, cured meats & cheese plates in a rustic, cozy setting.

dishes.title: Spaghetti alla Bottarga
dishes.desc: Spaghetti with cured fish roe, garlic, red pepper flakes, and olive oil.

dishes.title: Bistecca alla Fiorentina
dishes.desc: Grilled T-bone steak seasoned with sea salt and rosemary, served with roasted potatoes and sautéed spinach.

restaurants.title: State Bird Provisions
restaurants.short_description: Inventive New American fare served dim sum-style in a small, bustling setting with an open kitchen.

dishes.title: State Bird
dishes.desc: Fried quail served with provisions (changing accompaniments), inspired by Singapore's Hainanese chicken rice.

dishes.title: Pork Belly
dishes.desc: Roasted pork belly with plum, ginger, and lime sauce, served on a bao bun.

dishes.title: Tipic Pork Belly
dishes.desc: Roasted pork belly with plum, ginger, and lime sauce, served on a bao bun.
